title: Charger, 1760s–80s
provenance: Eugene V. and Clare E. Thaw; 2006: acquired by Museum
creditline: Gift of Eugene V. and Clare E. Thaw
description: Circular form with shaped rim; grey underglaze; Callot figures and floral vase in orange-tan.

tombstone.epitaph: Charger, 1760s–80s. Tin-glazed earthenware. Gift of Eugene V. and Clare E. Thaw. 2006-27-1.
